Name: Salflower Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Classic sweet and sour enhanced by floral notes.
History: Created on 12th April 2007 by Salvatore Calabrese at Fifty in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Salflower Sour contains 169 calories
